bug.author: maldivien
bug.summary: File names with open/close brackets dont work
bug.description: I have to remove the brackets after renaming files because VoTT cant read them.

comments.comment: That's an interesting bug I will take a look at it over the Upcoming week and resolve

I found something else too, if i add more image files to the annotated directory the when i open the project again the boxes mess up, and to fix it i have to rename with an alphabet that comes after the last annotated filenames first character..very strange but have proven this through tests. for example: if have images in a folder that starts with box1, box2, box3 ... then if i add anything that starts with A then t mess up, it has to be a char after character 'B'.
We are not able to reproduce this issue. Please let us know if you continue to have issues.
